cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.invokable

Class AnnotationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.invokable.AnnotationHelper

  • public class AnnotationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    AnnotationHelper provides static methods which are used for annotation parsing.
    Author:
    Michal Kit

    • Method Detail

      • getAnnotation

        public static java.lang.annotation.Annotation getAnnotation(java.lang.Class annotationClass,
                                            java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] annotations)
        Searches for annotation instance of the type "annotationClass" in the array of annotations.
        Parameters:
        annotationClass - type of the annotation to be searched for.
        annotations - array of annotation instances where the search is performed
        Returns:
        found annotation instance or null if the search fails

      • getAnnotatedMethods

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Method> getAnnotatedMethods(java.lang.Class c,
                                                           java.lang.Class annotationClass)
        Returns list of methods in the class definition which are annotated with the given annotation class.
        Parameters:
        c - class definition to be parsed
        annotationClass - class of annotation that should be considered during the parsing
        Returns:
        list of found methods

      • getAnnotatedMethod

        public static java.lang.reflect.Method getAnnotatedMethod(java.lang.Class c,
                                          java.lang.Class annotationClass)
        Returns a method in the class definition which are annotated with the given annotation class.
        Parameters:
        c - class definition to be parsed
        annotationClass - class of annotation that should be considered during the parsing
        Returns:
        matching method or null in case of search failure

      • getParameters

        public static java.util.List<Parameter> getParameters(java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                                      java.lang.Class annotationClass)
        Returns list of method parameters, which are annotated with the given annotation class.
        Parameters:
        method - Method object that needs to be parsed
        annotationClass - class of annotation that should be considered during the parsing
        Returns:
        list of Parameter instances which fulfills search criteria.
        See Also:
        Parameter
